New Records: LeBron James scored a career-high triple-double with 21 points, 13 assists, and 12 rebounds
Key Match Events: The Lakers took charge with an 8-0 run into the break and a 10-0 surge shortly after it
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paul George scored nine points for the Sixers, who dropped to 1-7 while playing without two of their top three players
